price: 89.Koroosannuu kee uma taamat sinni nafsi yudlumeeniik lakal sinni Rabbil gaceeh yotoobe maray sinni taama yessemeqqe Akke waytek, toysa Diggah Yalli woo marah dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min baʿdi dhālika wa-aṣlaḥū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
